articles.title: Stock trading platform Robinhood to launch in UK after two failed attempts - CNBC
articles.description: Robinhood hood said Thursday that it's set to launch its platform in the U.K., in the company's third attempt at cracking international expansion.
articles.content:
A woman's silhouette holds a smartphone with the Robinhood Markets logo in the background.

articles.title: Amazon Launches Chatbot With Almost Same Name as OpenAI's Controversial Secret AI - Futurism
articles.description: OpenAI may have just been beaten to the punch when it comes to AI naming rights by Microsoft's cloud computing division.
articles.content:
Well, this is awkward.
Susie Q
Following a very chaotic two weeks, we're still none the wiser as to exactly why OpenAI CEO Sam Altman was sacked. Among theories circulating online, though, was news… [+1702 chars]

articles.title: Disclosure of climate-related financial risks - bis.org
articles.description: The Basel Committee on Banking Supervision today issued a public consultation paper on a Pillar 3 disclosure framework for climate-related financial risks.
